title: 10/28/2021 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 10/28/2021 DPS Best Of
description:
Jason and Mike preview tonight’s matchup on Thursday Night Football, examine the latest with Deshaun Watson, are joined by USA Today’s MLB columnist Bob Nightengale to talk World Series, explain why Sam Darnold is proving Jason right, and Fox Sports NFL insider Jay Glazer joins the show!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
